alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:45PM EDT until April 09 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:31 PM EDT Friday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:31 PM EDT Friday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 9.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 5 pm: 12.4 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 12.1 Sat 2 am 12.1 Sat 8 am 11.0 Sat 2 pm 10.7 Sat 8 pm 10.7 Sun 2 am 10.6 Sun 8 am 10.5 Sun 2 pm 10.3 Sun 8 pm 10.1 Mon 2 am 9.8 Mon 8 am 9.6 Mon 2 pm MSG &&
